text: «ḥizibochēmi hoyi! berisu (betelakihubeti madiresi) layi genizebini ālit’eyik’achihumi፡፡ minidayē be’ālahi layi inijī belēla layi āyidelemi፡፡ inēmi inezīyani yamenutini ābararī āyidelehumi፡፡ inerisu gētachewini yemīgenanyu nachewina፡፡ gini inēmi yemitisasatu ḥizibochi honachihu āyachiḫwalehu፡፡»
